text.label: This dialog allows users to pull their flightplan from simbrief.
1. ACARS is only available if your VHF3 radio is in data mode, and the radio is supplied with electrical power
2. Flightplan uplink is only available before engine start, if a flightplan is not yet entered in the MCDU
3. If your FlightGear has installed Navigraph procedure files, it is reccomended not to include a SID or STAR in your
SimBrief flightplan, as you will probably not be able to select a different procedure afterwards if you need to.
If you don't have procedures installed, then it's fine to leave them in.
4. Please enter your username (alias for Navigraph accounts) in the following text field (not case sensitive)
